short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The figures in graded problems are now selectable. It's annoying that they weren't to begin with.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it so, at MyFinance lab, the figures in the graded and practice problems are now selectable! Also, when you copy them, it removes the formatting that makes the uninterpretable by Excel.
